name: kvm-switcher
title: KVM Switcher
description: Cross-platform KVM switcher for displays with built-in KVM and DDC/CI support. Supports HDMI, DisplayPort, and Type-C inputs.
author: farizio_kautsar

commands.name: switch-to-hdmi1
commands.title: Switch to HDMI 1
commands.description: Sets monitor input to HDMI 1 (VCP Code 17)

commands.name: switch-to-hdmi2
commands.title: Switch to HDMI 2
commands.description: Sets monitor input to HDMI 2 (VCP Code 18)

commands.name: switch-to-dp1
commands.title: Switch to DisplayPort 1
commands.description: Sets monitor input to DisplayPort 1 (VCP Code 15)

commands.name: switch-to-dp2
commands.title: Switch to DisplayPort 2
commands.description: Sets monitor input to DisplayPort 2 (VCP Code 16)

commands.name: switch-to-vga1
commands.title: Switch to VGA
commands.description: Sets monitor input to VGA 1 (VCP Code 1)

commands.name: switch-to-dvi1
commands.title: Switch to DVI
commands.description: Sets monitor input to DVI 1 (VCP Code 3)

commands.name: switch-to-custom
commands.title: Switch to Custom Input
commands.description: Enter a manual VCP code to switch to a specific monitor input.

preferences.name: customCode
preferences.title: DDC Input Code
preferences.description: The numeric VCP code for the input

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
